data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Municipal de Portimao have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Estadio Municipal de Portimao - Portimonense kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Aves.
Oumar Diakhite (Aves) has received a yellow card from Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Ball goes out of play for a Aves goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Aves at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Aves close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Aves.
Free kick Aves.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Hugo Miguel signals a Aves throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Hugo Miguel awards Portimonense a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Portimonense.
Portimonense needs to be cautious. Aves have an attacking throw-in.
Aves's Claudio Tavares misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 14, Portimonense have a goal kick.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 17, Dener's header is off-target for Portimonense.
Aves have a goal kick.
Aves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Aylton Boa Morte.
Portimonense's Aylton Boa Morte is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Aves in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 21, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Aves in the half of Portimonense.
Aylton Boa Morte (Portimonense) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Aves goal kick.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 24, Aves drive forward but Marius Mouandilmadji is judged offside.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Portimonense.
In the minute 26, Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
In Portimao, Dener of Portimonense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Aves in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Aves's area.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Aves.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 34, Aylton Boa Morte for the home team is judged to be offside.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aves's half?
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Can Aves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 43, Dener of Portimonense is pulled up for offside.
Aves will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portimonense.
Aves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Aves.
Lucas (Portimonense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Hugo Miguel blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Portimao - Aves with the kick-off.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 46, Ricardo Vaz Te is on a sub for Fali Cande for Portimonense.
Ricardo Vaz Te (Portimonense) strikes at Estadio Municipal de Portimao but his header is cleared.
In the minute 48, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Aves.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 50, Aves have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense pushes forward through Bruno Tabata, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a Portimonense throw-in in Aves's half.
In the minute 54, Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Mohamed Toure for Aves drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Portimao Portimonense's Jackson Martinez is caught offside.
In the minute 56, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Hugo Miguel awards Aves a goal kick.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Fernandes replacing Bruno Costa.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Aylton Boa Morte with Anderson de Oliveira da Silva.
In the minute 59, Marius Mouandilmadji of Aves gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Aves.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Aves in their own half.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Portimonense push forward at Estadio Municipal de Portimao and Lucas Fernandes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aves defence.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Goal! Portimonense have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Willyan Rocha.
In the minute 62, Great play from Bruno Tabata to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aves's half?
In the minute 66, Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Aves's area.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Aves.
Willyan Rocha (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Aves's Reko Silva breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Afonso Figueiredo with Bruno Felipe. This is the first substitution made today by Nuno Manta Santos.
In the minute 68, Aves make their second substitution with Jose Varela replacing Mohamed Toure.
Nuno Manta Santos is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Pedro Soares replacing Marius Mouandilmadji.
Free kick Aves.
In the minute 70, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Portimonense's Koki Anzai has run offside.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In Portimao Portimonense attack through Ricardo Vaz Te. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 73, Hugo Miguel awards Aves a goal kick.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Ball safe as Aves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portimonense needs to be cautious. Aves have an attacking throw-in.
Aves's Ruben Oliveira gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Portimonense drive upfield and Bruno Tabata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Aves defender.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In Portimao, Lucas (Portimonense) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 80, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Aves.
Pedro Soares is booked for the away team.
In the minute 81, Koki Anzai for Portimonense is whistled offside.
Eric Veiga is replacing Zidane Banjaqui for the away team.
Free kick Aves.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Aves.
Free kick for Aves in their own half.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Hugo Miguel signals a Aves throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Reko Silva (Aves) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Aves make their fifth substitution with Bruno Jesus replacing Oumar Diakhite.
In the minute 86, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Aves in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 87, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Fernando Medeiros is replacing Jackson Martinez for the home team.
Aves's Claudio Tavares has been booked in Portimao.
Junior Tavares gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portimonense.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Portimonense move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Dener is the scorer with a header!
Lucas Fernandes with an assist there.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Aves territory.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aves are coming forward and Bruno Felipe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Aves surge into the attack at Estadio Municipal de Portimao but Jose Varelaâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Aves have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Beto is replacing Ricardo Vaz Te for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
